reviews.review: The game is very good. Even though it can be pretty confusing at times, I would still rate it a solid 9/10. A bit lacking in plot though, that's more seen in out of game content.

Undoubtedly one of the best games out there. Story was a bit short but it was the best 5 hours of my life. It was challenging and rewarding. If you enjoyed the first one I can endorse that you play the second you wont regret it. Your only regret will be that their isnt a third installment. This game is an AWESOME CLASSIC! It's not everyday you get to play a puzzle FPS. Old but gold.

The mind twisting game mechanics surrounding the portals is just mind blowing. Portal does a good job at teaching the player game mechanics, while also making it fun, and not too drawn out. The over-arching story surrounding GLaDOS is another great add to this game. I definitely recommend this.
Neben Portal 2 das beste Spiel aller Zeiten.

The cake isn't a lie... you just weren't thinking with portals

https://youtu.be/-ac5G15A59s?t=69

Ah, Portal... The classic, the one, the only. The precursor to one of the best games I've ever played in my entire life. It's a pretty short game; you can speedrun it without even realizing. 19 test chambers, and a well-made and unexpected ending... Still, I think it's worth it. Even if it's only for the way it feels to play this oldie. Even if it's only for the small amount of test chambers it appears to provide... It's simple, it's classy, it's engaging. It's Portal.
